summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2140 for the improvement of Fourteenth Avenue from Yesler Way to East Fir Street, all in The City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 21539, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
